TEXTO.texto: $B1./B Mr and Mrs Smith bought our house. They are very nice people.
$B2./B Rob had been driving all day. He was tired and stopped at the petrol station.
$B3./B Your uncle lives in England. He has sent you a present.
$B4./B The cake fell on the floor. It had taken me a long time to make.
$B5./B I've just met George Johnson. He got married last month.
$B6./B Someone stole her car. It was parked outside her house.
$B7./B My younger sister is in the café. She wants to meet you.
$B8./B My parents used to live in Japan. They speak Japanese.
